item.title: [Python] Port from argparse to hydra
item.description: This is a reminder of what I checked when converting the Python argparse settings to hydra. Finally, I wrote a convenient function that only hydra has. Introduction When writing an experiment script for machine learning in python, argparse was used as a setting method for hyperparameters. However, as the experiment became more complicated, there was a desire to have a considerable number of lines in the file that describes the setting of argparse and to structure the setting.
